div.pre: 1871 Jw√¢la Mukhi, near Kangra, (491) c. 140 km. NE of Amritsar, Punjab, India, c. 1870 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 32 AR Apollodotus II: 27 dr. Amoegha-bhuti: 3 dr. Dhara Ghosha: 1 dr. Vamika Rudra Vama: 1 dr. Disposition: unknown Cunningham, NC 1872, p. 158; 1873, p. 210
